short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan QR Code and Read it Fast!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Qr Code Scanner & Reader

Effortlessly scan and decode QR codes with this fast and reliable QR Code Scanner & Reader! This extension makes it easy to read QR codes directly from your device without needing extra apps. Perfect for quick access to URLs, contact information, and other data embedded in QR codes.

Features:

- Fast Scanning: Quickly scans QR codes with minimal load time.
- Easy to Use: Just open the extension, point to the QR code, and instantly access the decoded content.
- Privacy-Focused: Securely reads QR codes without saving your data.
- Multi-Purpose: Works for URLs, text, contact info, and more.

Perfect for anyone needing a reliable, secure, and user-friendly QR code scanner right from their browser!
